Desc.entry: Joanne Poulton offers tuition in English for Speakers of Other Languages (ESOL), basic, intermediate and advanced skills for life - levels 1,2,3. Art and Design BTec levels 1,2,3, & 4 (specialist tutor in creative software packages and digitally produced art). Previous experience teaching children, teenagers and adults in both classroom and private tuition capacity, 3 years ESOL experience. Will travel to students home in Central, Netherthorpe, Upperthorpe, Hillsborough, Crookes, Broomhill and Hanover areas.
